document.full_text: a bomb killed 15 people including 10 foreigners in morocco's bustling tourist destination of marrakesh, state television said on thursday, in an attack that bore the hallmark of islamist militants.
document.title: bomb attack in morocco tourist cafe kills 15
lines_and_colors: a bomb killed 15 people including 10 foreigners in morocco's bustling tourist destination of marrakesh, state television said on thursday, in an attack that bore the hallmark of islamist militants.
